area.name: Area
area.description: The area of the move. Like a room, a city, a country, or a world.

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.description: Easy to wield and keep your grip on.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Does harm to anything that passes through. Counts as armour against any attacks that pass through it.

close.name: Close
close.description: Effective at fairly close quarters—outside arms’ reach, but not too far

forceful.name: Forceful
forceful.description: Pushes things around, allowing you to “force them where you want them” in addition to normal attack effects.

life-drain.name: Life-Drain
life-drain.description: Transfers life energy: the wielder is healed for as many points of harm as were inflicted. E.g. if you inflict 2-harm, then you heal 2-harm from your injuries.

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: This weapon is heavy and difficult to wield.

holy.name: Holy
holy.description: This will be more effective against monsters with a weakness to holy items.

ignore-armour.name: Ignore Armour
ignore-armour.description: Ignores protective armour. Armour has no effect on this harm.

intimate.name: Intimate
intimate.description: Effective at the closest of quarters—within the embrace of your foe.

loud.name: Loud
loud.description: Loud enough that it draws attention.

magic.name: Magic
magic.description: Enchanted, and so can affect certain creatures and armours that are proof against normal weapons.

many.name: Many
many.description: These weapons are small enough you can carry a large number of them.

material.name: Material
material.description: This weapon is made from the named material, and is thus useful against monsters with that weakness.

messy.name: Messy
messy.description: Causes extra collateral damage or is particularly gory.

quick.name: Quick
quick.description: Fast to prepare and attack with, giving you a better chance of going first.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: This weapon has limited ammunition, and may run out otherwise it just isn’t gonna work.

restraining.name: Restraining
restraining.description: A successful attack entangles or grabs the victim.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: This weapon is slow to prepare and attack with.

small.name: Small
small.description: This weapon is tiny and easy to conceal.

unreliable.name: Unreliable
unreliable.description: This weapon needs regular cleaning and maintenance, otherwise it just isn’t gonna work.

useful.name: Useful
useful.description: This weapon has other uses aside from violence.

valuable.name: Valuable
valuable.description: This weapon is antique, or made of valuable materials.

volatile.name: Volatile
volatile.description: This weapon is dangerous and unstable.

electronic.name: Electronic
electronic.description: This item is electronic and requires a power source to operate.

iron.name: Iron
iron.description: Weakness to or made of iron.

salt.name: Salt
salt.description: Weakness to or made of salt.

crossroads.name: Crossroads
crossroads.description: To bring people, and things, together
